page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: Recreation is provided in our area for both adults and children. There is a{Saturday night club,}held in the church hall from 8:30PM to 11:00PM. Mr. McMillan, the local minister is organiser and club leader. There are games to play _ table tennis, snooker, darts and also some board games. Mrs. Nicholson runs a{badminton {club;}on Thursday night the juniors meet.There are twenty members and they generally play doubles. Sometimes matches are arrangad against other clubs. Senior badminton is on Mondays and Thursdays. Miss Rodgers the infant teacher in our school organises a{gymnastics club on Wednesday after school. Participants work towards certificates and sometimes there is a competition with other schools.
